review: Simple to operate. Works well. When coupled with Amazon Prime Videos and Netflix, Fire offers a whole new dimension of movie viewing to your television.
author: Sandy Jones

review: Easy to install and use.  I love it.  I did buy the cable to connect to the TV, I do think it should be made more clear that you need to also purchase the cable when you buy the Fire TV.
author: L. Blake Borate "Blake"

review: The Fire TV is the best low power HTPC on the market right now. What's the big deal? It has the big streaming services: Netflix, Amazon Instant, and Hulu. The big deal is that you can sideload Android apps on this device, including Kodi (formerly known as XBMC). This enables you to play content you already have downloaded and stored on your network plus access to all of the plugins that Kodi has for streaming and other types of media.On top of all this you get great hardware which adds up to a very snappy UI and pleasant user experience. With the ability to sideload Kodi, the Fire TV beats the pants off of the WD TV Live.
author: Bryan Creel

review: Quite simply, the biggest bang for the buck of any electronics I've ever purchased.
author: Herman P.

review: I like the ideal of the Fire TV, but the cost and limited items for use are not worth the money.  You have to have the other add-ons to get all the TV, Movies and other shows. The free shipping is ok, but whats that got to do with the Fire TV?  I have not made up my mine if I want to go ahead with a year subscirtion yet.  Would like more feed back from others on this.
author: Jmo

review: Very easy to setup. Remote was a learning curve but once I got it, very easy to use. Was surprised there wasn't an off button.
author: Marjorie Kurth

review: I have literally eliminated cable TV by using Amazon Fire TV.  I have two and I am going to buy a third. By eliminating Cable TV I am saving over $85.00 a month even after paying $8.00 a month for Netflix.  This is a no-brainer and the future of television viewing.
author: Eric

review: Not much in the way of free tv where my lady friend lives as it is a small and remote town.  The cable service there is expensive and unreliable and doesn't offer much anyway.  This was a gift for her at Christmas and she loves it.  With a prime account, she has access to lots of free movies and tv shows and music.  It is really great for her.
